akn:content.akn:p:
§ 711. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, Pub. L. 95–195, § 2, Nov. 18, 1977, 91 Stat. 1415, which set out definitions, was omitted from the Code as being of special and not general application.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 95–195, § 1, Nov. 18, 1977, 91 Stat. 1415, provided that Pub. L. 95–195, enacting this subchapter, could be cited as the “Siletz Indian Tribe Restoration Act”.
